website_summaries.verdict: A quality primer that provides coverage and sun protection.
pros: Primer is hydrating and contains SPF 30
Effectively smooths over large pores and imperfections
Light to medium coverage can be worn on its own but wears well under foundation as well
cons: Pump dispenser becomes less effective when the product runs low

customer_reviews.title: A makeup must
customer_reviews.text: I got introduced to this cream when I worked at a high end spa that sold bareMinerals. All of their makeup artists used the Prime Time BB cream. Glides onto your skin easily and has a velvety feel. I use a powder foundation which adheres very nicely to this primer. Can be worn with or without foundation. Has nice pigmentation and great SPF coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Knitty59

customer_reviews.title: best stuff ever
customer_reviews.text: This does not break you out, it covers like a foundation but not as heavy. You can wear it alone or under foundation as a primer. i am older now and do not like all that make up on. This looks very natural, non oily, cream cover up for a flawless complexion. I wished i found it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Liu

customer_reviews.title: A makeup go-to
customer_reviews.text: This primer definitely keeps the powder foundation on all day - I think it's the first makeup i've ever used that stayed on that long. It doesn't clog my pores, which is nice because I am prone to breakouts. This reduced the number of breakouts I have. It's fairly expensive for a small bottle, but it does work. During the summer, I actually just used the primer a lot of days. It evened out my skin tone enough that I didn't even need the foundation over it. I like it better than the non-tinted primer. It's worth a try if you're considering Bare Minerals products.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Bird

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Mineral Sunscreen & Outstanding Makeup Primer that can be used all by itself!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of this product. So smooth - amazing that I finally have good mineral sunscreen that actually makes foundation application easier and actually look so much better. I also use it instead of foundation when I don't want / need to apply foundation. I can be safe outside and have fantastic looking skin with this one product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C. Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love how silky the feel of this product is. It provides enough coverage where I don't feel like I always need foundation and provides the SPF I was looking for. Definitely my favorite primer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Healthy sun screen AND great lightweight cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer! I used it as a foundation/sunscreen in the summer. It is great because it doesn’t use any of the chemical sunscreen ingredients—just zinc oxide and titanium dioxide—so is safe for every day.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Elizabeth Stoufer

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite things
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and wear it everyday. I wear it alone, and I wear it under foundation. The primer acts as a thin film over your own skin allowing the make up to sit on the primer rather than to go into your pours. You’ll use much less make up, especially eye make up. It’s magic. Sometimes I buy it at the mall, but it’s cheaper through Amazon. I give it as gifts. It’s one of my favorite things.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous. Everything one could ask for in a tinted primer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Lighter and more sheer than the traditional foundations and with SPF to boot. Love it! Works great on its own or as primer for foundation.
customer_reviews.author: TNH

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a Peely, Chalky Finish
customer_reviews.text: Do not use if you use a retinoid as you will be left with peely product all over your face. After exfoliating, I apply a toner and moisturizer and have a smooth canvas to start with. After applying this primer, it began to cause my skin to flake which combined with the product leaving a flaky mess. Would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: DawnG

customer_reviews.title: SPF 39!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Found it at marshals and have been hooked on it every since.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Rogga

customer_reviews.title: It is a decent primer and blends well. Only ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent primer and blends well. Only issue I've had is that it is a little oily compared to the primer that was not tinted.
customer_reviews.author: redsavana

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver in the summer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have been using it all spring/summer and the SPF has been a lifesaver. I also think it has pretty nice coverage on its own too. Feels good on.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR SUMMER! Longwear, layer with other Bare Minerals products
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FOR THE SUMMER! Lightweight, non-greasy tinted primer. Long-wear, layer with other Bare Minerals products! Love this product, I’ve used it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Clever_Witmaker

customer_reviews.title: Does not work like Prime Time at all
customer_reviews.text: Item is basically a watered down version of a foundation. Does not go on smoothly, nor does it provide coverage or even suffice as a primer. I would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gel with sunscreen. 2 products in 1.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Have been using the gel without sunscreen for many years & had to add another skin product for sun protection. Now have both in one & leaves your skin feeling soft as a baby’s bottom.
customer_reviews.author: J.P. M.

customer_reviews.title: So smooth
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I’ve used Bare Minerals makeup for years but this is my first experience with the primer. So soft and smooth. I often wear it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bowser

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Either they changed their formula or this is not the same stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Bare Minerals Primer
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered this before with no problem. However, my last purchase arrived so old it was all caked up in the bottle. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bitsy

customer_reviews.title: SPF and Primer with some coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer! It is very light weight on your skin, blends well with alittle not of coverage and SPF as well enabling ease of makeup application.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Dee

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and creamy, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I use all bareMinerals products because I like how natural they are and how well they work. This is no exception. It's the primer and the foundation, so it covers well and provides a nice adhesive for their loose powdered foundations. A little goes a long way, so I use one pump for my face and my neck. There's enough yellow tones in this to counteract any blue/purple undereye coloration so I don't have to use a separate concealer. I like to keep my makeup natural looking and not piled on, and this works well for that. I don't feel like my skin is smothered, and I've never broken out in acne from using it. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: D. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Shake vigorously for best results!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best primer out there. For that natural look when I'm running errands, a dab is all I need - no additional makeup required. I love that it has sunscreen, primer and tint all in one. I bought my first bottle at the makeup counter and the clerk warned me to shake it vigorously before each use or it would separate. I see reviews that the nozzle splatters. I shake mine like mad and have never had a problem. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Avatrx

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice primer. I love how smooth & silky it is going on. Doesn’t make me break out. Both my teen daughters like it too & they are very picky about their make up. I like that it has the spf as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sweebk

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky, skin feels smooth and silky.
customer_reviews.text: Feels very silky going on. Not sticky at all. Wears well under liquid and gel foundation. I sometimes try another primer but always come back to this. My skin is very dry and this is comforting. Let dry before applying foundation. I have rosacea and this has never caused a flare up.
customer_reviews.author: N. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great product, better price than in store!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this item before, at ULTA. I loved it then, and love it now!!! For a better price on amazon it's the same amazing product. I'm very happy ! It is so smooth to apply and makes my skin very soft.
customer_reviews.author: SydleyLueHoo

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't blend well. I much prefer using a separate primer and then tinted product or mineral powder. This BB primer creme looked thick and unnatural. I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It actually matched my very VERY pale skin perfectly and ...
customer_reviews.text: It actually matched my very VERY pale skin perfectly and that almost never happens! Only down side is I have oily skin and this product tends to slide around and get patchy :/
customer_reviews.author: K Ren Y

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: Makes my makeup routine so simple. Goes on smooth and makes my skin look lovely, I was so happy to be able to purchase it on amazon and get it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MJO2

customer_reviews.title: Nice primer
customer_reviews.text: The bottle design stinks...the pump works once or twice and then you have to open it to get anything out. I expected that after the last bottle, so I am not surprised this go around. Works like I expect it. Smooth, light coverage. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Fish

customer_reviews.title: Neutralizing Primer discontinuation got you down?  This is a good replacement
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after recently running out of Bare's (discontinued) neutralizing primer. It works well and has a light and smooth application like the other primer did. It doesn't cover redness as well or as long as the neutralizing primer did, but it still covers my redness better than all of the $30+ "redness reducers" I've been trying since the discontinuation of the neutralizing primer. Also it doesn't make me break out like everything else does, but thats to be expected from bareminerals. If you're in the same boat as me with the discontinuation, this is the best replacement I found for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Make my makeup last longer
customer_reviews.text: Help with discoloration of skin and even out my skin tone
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Green

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as the regular prime time but it blended well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and silky
customer_reviews.text: This primer is my favorite. The tint is perfect and sometimes I wear it as a light foundation and it perfectly smooths out my complexion. It’s silky and doesn’t cause any skin irritation. I have fair skin and this primer matches my skin tone perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: kurnerBritton

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Prime Time BB SPF 30 Primer Cream, Fair, 1 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: This is a multitasking, complexion perfecting primer. It immediately diminishes the appearance of imperfections and helps to correct uneven skin tone. It glides on smoothly and can be worn alone or as a foundation primer that wont dry out skin.
feature_bullets: This is a multitasking, complexion perfecting primer
It immediately diminishes the appearance of imperfections and helps to correct uneven skin tone
It glides on smoothly and can be worn alone or as a foundation primer that wont dry out skin
